document.full_text: some see mao as a deeply flawed figure who had his achievements. others see a machiavellian killer. yet others see a symbol of days when people were more equal.
document.title: letter from china: mao's legacy still divides china
lines_and_colors: some see mao as a deeply flawed figure who had his achievements. others see a machiavellian killer. yet others see a symbol of days when people were more equal.
